pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measuring Ecosystem Multi-Functionality and Its Decomposition // Provide simple functions to (i) compute a class of multi- functionality measures for a single ecosystem for given function weights, (ii) decompose gamma multi-functionality for pairs of ecosystems and K ecosystems (K can be greater than 2) into a within-ecosystem component (alpha multi-functionality) and an among-ecosystem component (beta multi-functionality). In each case, the correlation between functions can be corrected for. Based on biodiversity and ecosystem function data, this software also facilitates graphics for assessing biodiversity- ecosystem functioning relationships across scales.
